text: kthyrana min al'anbia' 'arsalna fi alqurun al'uwlaa alty madat qabl qawmak 'ayuha alnby. wama yatihim min nabiin 'iilaa kanuu bih yastahziuwn kasthza' qawmak bk, fa'ahlakna man kdhdhabu rslna, wakanuu 'ashadu quatan wbasana min qawmik ya mhmd, wamadat euqubat al'awalin bi'ana ahliku; bsbb kufruhum wtghyanhm wasthzayhm banbyayhm. wafi hdha tslyt lilnabii salaa allah ealayh wslm
